sentences: Ta maksis k√ºmme dollarit eest toitu.
context: The word 'dollarit' is the partitive form of the Estonian noun 'dollar'. It means 'dollar(s)' and is used when referring to an unspecified or partial quantity of dollars. In the dictionary definition, it appears in the phrase 'sajadollarine' which literally means 'hundred-dollar' as in a hundred-dollar bill.
